column4: I'm trying to install libc6_2.3.5-8.i386.deb.... but when i do dpkg -i ..... It won't install saying there are conflicts with the previous version because of initrd-tools
any idea how to solve this?
oh please dont do that
do not do not do not
dont install that files
if you install non ubuntu pkgs (especially libc6) you will certainly break your ubuntu
what are you trying to use that needs it?
ubuntu doesnt have those packages?
no. the dia and avi-xmms
my ubuntu doensn't have either dev packages
have you enabled universe and multiverse repos?
in ubuntu, the universe and multiverse repositories get you maybe another 14,000 programs
PLEASE dont install non ubuntu pkgs
too late... for some pkg
i suggest you remove those and replace them with ubuntu packages, if possible
ok
should I download sources or just binaries??
you can have both sets of lines in your sources.list
ok thanx
but will I get an upgrade of the libc6?? because I need it for some specific software
i have another method for your specific software use
which?
join me in #kubuntu-offtopic please
done
